espnscrapeR 0.5.1
  • Reference

Get ESPN QBR for NFL football

Source: R/get_nfl_qbr.R
get_nfl_qbr.Rd

Get ESPN QBR for NFL football

get_nfl_qbr(season = 2020, week = NA, season_type = "Regular")

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character
week

Either NA to return season or week 1 to 4 for playoffs or 1 to 17 for regular
season_type

Character - either "Regular" or "Playoffs"

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get ALL Playoff QBR from 2016 season
get_nfl_qbr("2016", season_type = "Playoffs", week = NA)

#> Scraping QBR totals for 2016!
#> # A tibble: 12 x 22
#>    season season_type game_week  team_abb player_id short_name    rank qbr_total
#>    <chr>  <chr>       <chr>      <chr>    <chr>     <chr>        <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 2016   Playoffs    Season To… ATL      11237     M. Ryan          1      90.5
#>  2 2016   Playoffs    Season To… GB       8439      A. Rodgers       2      83.2
#>  3 2016   Playoffs    Season To… NE       2330      T. Brady         3      75.8
#>  4 2016   Playoffs    Season To… DAL      2577417   D. Prescott      4      73.6
#>  5 2016   Playoffs    Season To… SEA      14881     R. Wilson        5      60.3
#>  6 2016   Playoffs    Season To… PIT      5536      B. Roethlis…     6      58.7
#>  7 2016   Playoffs    Season To… NYG      5526      E. Manning       7      46.9
#>  8 2016   Playoffs    Season To… MIA      11128     M. Moore         8      44.9
#>  9 2016   Playoffs    Season To… DET      12483     M. Stafford      9      44.1
#> 10 2016   Playoffs    Season To… HOU      14879     B. Osweiler     10      40.6
#> 11 2016   Playoffs    Season To… KC       8416      A. Smith        11      31.4
#> 12 2016   Playoffs    Season To… OAK      2576261   C. Cook         12       6.5
#> # … with 14 more variables: pts_added <dbl>, qb_plays <dbl>, epa_total <dbl>,
#> #   pass <dbl>, run <dbl>, exp_sack <dbl>, penalty <dbl>, qbr_raw <dbl>,
#> #   sack <dbl>, first_name <chr>, last_name <chr>, name <chr>,
#> #   headshot_href <chr>, team <chr>

# Get Regular season QBR for week 4 of 2019
get_nfl_qbr("2019", season_type = "Regular", week = 4)
